name: No Don't
description:
You are a spirit in a dungeon trying to save a foolish adventurer from death.

You cannot control any of the characters, however, you persuade them not to do some actions.

This game was submitted to the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Music - 
https://opengameart.org/content/desert-01
https://opengameart.org/content/desert-02
By Fantasy Musica

Sound Effects-
https://opengameart.org/content/black-smith-sounds
By ItsEddie

UI-
https://opengameart.org/content/ui-elements
By Buch

Other Art-
https://opengameart.org/content/roguelite
By LD
